net.creativeparkour

Class CPPlayerPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.creativeparkour.CPPlayerPosition

  • public class CPPlayerPosition
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player location in a parkour map, plus whether or not they are sneaking, wearing Elytra and holding EnderPearls at this location.
    This is used to display good looking ghosts.
    Author:
    Obelus

    • Constructor Detail

      • CPPlayerPosition

        public CPPlayerPosition(org.bukkit.Location loc,
                        boolean sneak,
                        boolean elytra,
                        boolean pearl,
                        org.bukkit.block.Block baseBlock)
        Creates a new CPPlayerPosition with a location and the base block of a CPMap.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location of the player in the world.
        sneak - Whether or not the player is sneaking.
        elytra - Whether or not the player is wearing Elytra.
        pearl - Whether or not the player is hording Ender Pearls.
        baseBlock - Base block (minimum location) of the CPMap where the player is.

      • CPPlayerPosition

        public CPPlayerPosition(org.bukkit.util.Vector vect,
                        float pitch,
                        float yaw,
                        boolean sneak,
                        boolean elytra,
                        boolean pearl)
        Directly creates a new CPPlayerPosition, with a vector and some other values...
        Parameters:
        vect - Vector representing player's position from the minimum coordinate of the CPMap where they are.
        pitch - Player's pitch value.
        yaw - Player's yaw value.
        sneak - Whether or not the player is sneaking.
        elytra - Whether or not the player is wearing Elytra.
        pearl - Whether or not the player is hording Ender Pearls.

        public org.bukkit.Location getRealLoc(org.bukkit.Location baseLoc)

        Parameters:
        baseLoc - Location from which the calculation is done.
        Returns:
        Resulting Location.
